lenders.name: Shannon
lenders.loan_because: Every little bit helps. $25 is a night out for dinner for me, but it could be life altering to some of these people who need help.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because:
I believe most people living in poverty, especially in the developing world, are not looking for a 'hand out', rather a 'helping hand'.  After 17 years working for an international humanitarian organization, I learned first hand what a blessing it is to help another woman.  The theory of 
"Pay It Forward" is part of my life mission.  Involvement with Kiva is one more way to offer a 'helping hand' to another woman half way around the world, while sitting in my pajamas at home.  It comes back to me tenfold in blessings.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to the world that has given me so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach computers how to count money.

lenders.name: Kaitlin
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others.

lenders.name: Brandon and Heather
lenders.loan_because: the influece of a very good friend from west Africa has had on our life.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people achieve their dreams that have a financial aspect.

lenders.name: Ms. Brescher
lenders.loan_because: We live in a country that has so much. We have plenty to give and share, and we wanted to try and help others have a better life, which they deserve, so we raised money to loan. Besides, this is just a great thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: We are a high school World History teacher, and her many students, who are studying the challenges people face in the developing world. We hope we can help make a difference,  and make history by reducing world poverty.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I love to be able to help and if we use what little we have, the Lord honors those who live by faith in Him.

lenders.name: Abraham
lenders.occupational_info: I ahve started an Information and Communication Technology (ICT) business and need funds to run a sponsor program helping school leavers to get IT Qualifications.  I have been running this program with my own funds so far.  Aslo need to raise $2500 for an invitation to the Microsoft Head Office in Redmond in november 2007.  This is very important fo my business.

lenders.name: Molefi
lenders.loan_because: I want to increase my equity and participation in the company.
lenders.occupational_info: Negotiate tenders, pricing and ensure transformation.

lenders.name: AKINJIDE
lenders.loan_because: Am into cloths and shoes business in south africa mostly i do get my stock from outside country the problem i have is money to bust the business.i need help
lenders.occupational_info: importer and exporter.og general goods

lenders.name: Felton
lenders.loan_because: "A candle loses nothing by lighting another candle."

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computer systems.

lenders.name: Alba
lenders.loan_because: I believe in karma.

lenders.name: DAVID ANZURUNI
lenders.loan_because: i loan because  i need to extend my business and my bunisess help many people working for me because all them are refugees from across the world for employment please helpand your  support will serve many refugees in South Africa...
lenders.occupational_info: first of all nationawide then worldwide where is country of refugees and asylum seeker.

lenders.name: Phumlani
lenders.loan_because: i want to finance my initiative and currently i have registered my business but lack finances to buy material.
lenders.occupational_info: i am a life coach for young people. i do the following: offer career guidance, assist with CV writing, job searching skills,workshops on how to access tertiary education, study skills, time management, stress management.

lenders.name: Marcus
lenders.occupational_info: Studying 'Business and Development Studies' at Copenhagen Business School

lenders.name: ellen
lenders.loan_because: i like the idea of poor people being given a chance to become self suficient.
lenders.occupational_info: Work as a nurse in a intensiv care unit in a lokal, small hospital.

lenders.name: caroline
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I dance to make people happy.

lenders.name: Eva Johanne
lenders.loan_because: Everyone neeeds a friend and some loving care, sometimes. Next time it might be me - you - or you - or you.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with elderly sick people,  I am gifted.

lenders.name: marianne
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: ana
lenders.loan_because: I know what it feels like to need help and then get it !  One of the most defeating feelings is to feel that no one cares.   When I give money I am saying, "I care" , and I am grateful for the opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info:
I enjoy using my computer to make things, pictures, games, web pages.

I also massage peoples hands and feet, it helps them relax and feel positive about life and their health.

lenders.name: Alisa
lenders.loan_because: I am impressed by the hard work and drive of the lendees to band together to improve their lives, and the lives of their families.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should.
lenders.occupational_info: Responsible for all aspects of marketing and innovation for a leader climate research foundation.

lenders.name: Kristin B.
lenders.loan_because: I happen to live in one of the richest countries in the world and I'm able to help someone who doesn't. Why shouldn't I?

lenders.name: Rikke
lenders.loan_because: I can. And I should. And I really, really want to.

lenders.name: kathleen
lenders.loan_because:
Faith is taking the first step, even when you don't see the whole staircase......
Id like to help people who's taking their first steps twoards a better life for themselves and their children.

lenders.name: Dewan Abdullah Al
lenders.loan_because: I need to buy cloths to continuation of production of my boutique.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is to much profitable. Because more than 25% profit is posible here. moreover invested money returns to me within 3 month. So I donot need to invest more than us$5000 for one year.

lenders.name: Merete
lenders.loan_because: Farming are important all over the world. All of us need a farmers product every day :-) øilke the ide of helping peolple helping them selfs.
lenders.occupational_info: I breed miniaturepinscher dogs, we have 4 adult dogs at home. All of them are living in our hous as a familiy memeber. The puppies live wtih us from birth and until they are 8 weeks old. Then they move into new homes and get new owners.

lenders.name: DEBBIE
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping others less fortunate and in the power of giving.

lenders.name: Yukho
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to empower people to improve their own lives and the lives of their families.

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is EASY and it's FUN!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm Mexican-Canadian but live in Norway.  I work with Alzheimer's and Dementia patients part time.  The rest of my time I spend at home doing housework, cooking, and using the Internet to make a positive difference in this world for both people and animals.  Kiva is a genius idea and I've been hooked since the moment I heard about it.

lenders.name: Anette
lenders.loan_because: I beleive that every person on earth should be given all the nessarry support to empower themselfes. I think that KIVA is just a fenomenal idear. THANK YOU for Your great service to the world and for giving me a posserbility to participate.
lenders.occupational_info: General Mangager in a small theatre for children. I handle finances, sales and the organisation of the Theater Company

lenders.name: Gunn
lenders.loan_because: It was just a luck of the draw that I was born into good conditions. I did nothing to deserve it; no applications, no interviews, no hard work. Still, I have more than what I actually need. I think that people who are this lucky, have a moral obligation to help others out. We are all in this together, and you never know when you would have to rely on someone else. Those who can help, should really do so! And besides, giving brings a whole new dimension to life.

lenders.name: Carla
lenders.loan_because: I am a single mom.  I was given a hand-up by friends and I want to do the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with students that have learning problems.  I help them to do well in school and I love my work!

lenders.name: David & Sue
lenders.loan_because: We loan in appreciation of what we have and to help others improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We're retired from full-time work but are active volunteers in community work and carrying out conservation projects. It's great to be part of the Kiva community.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: I have a passion for people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who have developmental disabilities.

lenders.name: Hilde
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: I admire people's entrepreneurship, their hard work and willingness to make a difference....and because I'd like to give back a little of what I have been given.

lenders.name: ETANA
lenders.loan_because: I support the "loan-repayment" system. I like that it is building independence in individuals (unlike charity). I think supporting micro-enterprise is a better way for the U.S. to make international friends than its current policy of imperialism through war in Iraq & Afghanistan.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. Government Accountability Office (GAO). My team is International Affairs and Trade, and many reports are on micro-development. I draw illustrations to describe the words in the reports.

lenders.name: paul
lenders.loan_because: I can...There is nothing more simple than that.
lenders.occupational_info: I do research on diseases of children

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel like I'm helping somebody, which kind of feels good

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place, and everyone has to participate!

lenders.name: Samuele
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a new and important way to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage large collections of data in a computer system

lenders.name: Laurie
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help people while allowing them to build self esteem and keep their dignity.

lenders.name: Cheryl
lenders.loan_because: It's necessary.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep the systems running.

lenders.name: Citlalli
lenders.loan_because: Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege. --John D. Rockefeller, Jr.

lenders.loan_because:
I Believe we can help others to succeed in life. 
Creo en las microempresas y se que podemos ayudar a otros a salir adelante en sus vidas
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Branch Manager, and I lead my team to succeed

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I feel as though I have been so richly blessed in my life, and I want to be able to give back to others so that their dreams can come true too.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It is a great opportunity for new business owners.
lenders.occupational_info: Business to me is all about giving my employees the tools and suport they need to enable them to deliver great customer service. Further allowing them to build long term relationships with customers to secure future capital.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of high school students in the Bronx who are interested in making the world a better place. We hold fundraising events on campus that raise awareness about global poverty and use the money to fund our Kiva loans.

lenders.name: Grant

lenders.name: Theresa
lenders.loan_because: I took over a bankrupt business and lifted it up. I now short capital to boost my stock

lenders.name: B

lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses solve problems using technology

I know what it's like to need a hand up.

lenders.occupational_info: Athlete, Nurse, Artist, and curious observer. I like to ride my bike and I usually don't levitate.

lenders.name: Darcy

lenders.occupational_info: I produce television commercials

lenders.occupational_info: I work with patients adminstratively.

lenders.occupational_info: I have a wonderful husband, dog and pet guinea fowl. I provide legal counsel to a telecommunications management company that is my employer.

lenders.name: Patrick

lenders.occupational_info: helping people return to who they really are without the use of drugs and alcohol.

lenders.name: Marte
lenders.occupational_info: I publish "pop-up" books for children in Norway.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I believe loans are a good way to help support others by encouraging them to support themselves.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: Muhammad Yunus and the Grameen Bank were awarded the Nobel Peace Prize for spearheading the micro-lending movement. Micro loans fit into a broader desire to "give back", with the added appeal of having a direct connection to a very specific project

lenders.loan_because: I believe business can help

lenders.name: Gaurav
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: I have been given a lot in life and I feel it is my responsibility to give back as much as I can.  I believe in assisting people to be successful, but also in balancing that with encouraging responsibility.  Microloans seem like a great way to achieve that.

lenders.name: Beverly
lenders.loan_because: I can. For which I am grateful.

lenders.name: Marisa
lenders.loan_because: I am a female entrepreneur and would like to help other women succeed in their businesses.

lenders.occupational_info: I work for four attorneys in a small midwestern town as a law office manager. my husband farms and we have five children

lenders.occupational_info: Have you ever heard of Sisyphus?

lenders.name: Kate

Scott creates jewelry and other objects by inlaying natural materials into wood.

lenders.name: Aaron

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because:
I BELIEVE IN DREAMS

lenders.occupational_info:
I make homemade dog treats that are healthy and pretty :)  My goal is to go to Africa and help with water wells by Sept. 2012

www.ForYourDogs.com

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving, and helping my fellow man.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: I want to help women in developing countries

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others succeed in their dreams.  Even if I play a small part, it's the right thing to do.  When my daughter gets older, I will lend her money so that she can participate in Kiva as well.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of elementary school (9 year old students).  I teach my students not only about math and reading, but also about the world and that helping someone else makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: ABIGAIL
lenders.loan_because: to quote the friend who introduced me to Kiva, "we all should."

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: Happiness is supposed to be shared.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a global citizen - I want to contribute in some way. Entrepreneurship is a passion of mine!

lenders.name: Bela Lourdes
lenders.loan_because: I care and want to help make dreams come true

lenders.name: Bill & Marilyn
lenders.loan_because: We love the idea that these people are trying to help themslves.
lenders.occupational_info: Bill is a retired Insurance general agent who now volunteers 15 - 20 hrs a week at the American Red Cross.

lenders.name: Geena
lenders.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone's life
lenders.occupational_info: I do research in women's health care issues

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to support another community, and promote a higher level of sustainable development.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a horse breeding farm; every year we breed and sell babies, and let people breed to our horses.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I am greatful for the success I've had in my career and now it's time to help others build and achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: For 26 years I have helped people achieve the dream of owning a home.

lenders.name: Ignited Minds
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of like minded extroverts with a will to serve the community.
lenders.occupational_info: We aim at transforming the aspiring individuals into building blocks by providing the essentials.

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: John 13:34
lenders.occupational_info: Reading, studying, and writing papers...

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I have a business and know how hard it is when cashflow is tied up, to expand.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women especially who are working diligently to improve their economic condition, particularly those who are supporting their children in achieving an education.

lenders.name: Claus-Peter
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy to support such a great idea as microlending. This idea has the potential to improve our world and can give efficent support to people in developing countries.
lenders.occupational_info: inhouse business consultant with a big european company

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I want connect with people around the world and  help empower them to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people with movement disorders

lenders.name: Aurelia
lenders.loan_because: i think it would be helpful for these people. It could change their lives! Why not?

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: A good way to help communities around the world.

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate to have more than many others.  I feel that sharing in and believing in other people's dreams can make a difference.

lenders.name: Cory
lenders.loan_because: Most people were not born as lucky as I was; I want to share my good fortune with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer programs that help scientists study the human body and cure disease.

lenders.name: Judi
lenders.loan_because: it's a way to join with others to make a big difference in someone's life.  What goes around....comes around. It's not a handout...it's a hand Up!  My goal is to get my children and G-children involved in helping the world be a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Caring for people in the last stage of life.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I think its really neat, to be able to help people around the world without leaving my desk
lenders.occupational_info: I write programs for computers to make peoples lives easier.

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: It's such a great connection to have with people all over the world and to be able to help individuals improve their lives in a unique and fun way.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software to help doctors detect cancer faster and help patients more efficiently.

lenders.name: Nathaniel
lenders.loan_because: Anyone with the courage to create a business should be able to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people who own a business enter the U.S. market and grow sucessfully

lenders.name: Joanna
lenders.loan_because: Although I live below the poverty level in the United States, I still have a higher standard of living than many people who ask for loans through KIVA.  I started out making four $25 loans several years ago.  I keep reloaning that money as it gets repaid, and I feel that my initial $100 has gone a LONG way.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked throughout my life as an artist and also did freelance secretarial work.  At the age of 72, I am now retired due to disabilities, but I am an active and integral part of a multigenerational family.

lenders.name: David & Kerry
lenders.occupational_info: I help look after the medical needs of families, from newborn babies to frail elders

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: As I travel the world, I see smart, talented, industrious people who live in poverty for one reason: Lack of opportunity.  I hope my loans create that opportunity.

lenders.name: Duane Walrath
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: As a benefactor!

lenders.name: Kine
lenders.loan_because: I can and want to

lenders.name: Matt
lenders.loan_because: This is a much better use of my money than stowing it away for a bank to make interest off of it.  I would love to impact someone's life with even a small loan.

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I play an instrument called the flute.  I administrate and teach at a school of music.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I believe that building businesses can build communities.  Teach a man to fish...

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: The whole puzzle of the world is too much for me to try to fix, I know that. However I can take a single piece of that puzzle, take care of it and make a small difference. The beauty is that if many take up that challenge of a single piece of the puzzle, the world will be a better place for us all.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I believe that capitalism is the way to end poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I help build computers for telecommunications companies.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to need help and Kiva seems a practical way for me to reach out and help someone else.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I have a 2 acre garden where we grow vegetables for our local farmer's market. We both have other jobs but gardening is definitely our passion.

lenders.name: Miriam
lenders.loan_because: it's a great way to help people out.
lenders.occupational_info: I look after children while their parents go out to work.

lenders.name: Maryla
lenders.loan_because: I think is important to help people that have a dream and a plan to transform their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint portraits and love it.

lenders.name: Guy
lenders.loan_because: Everybody deserves the chance to provide for themselves and their family
lenders.occupational_info: My work involves remembering to do things. I have developed many useful tools for doing this. One is writing things down, another is paying someone else to remember things for me. But this seldom works!

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: Because it's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: retired foreign diplomat.

lenders.name: Marissa
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I am giving a high five to someone across the world. With a reach of a hand - a connection is formed, an energy to "go for it" is spread, and belief of success is instilled - I feel invigorated.

lenders.name: Sam
lenders.loan_because: every bit make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a mental hospital as a network administrator, handling all aspect of the hospital computer network.  The day to day function is pretty exciting as there are many things going on with computers.  Not as exciting as being out with nature tilling the land but almost.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: It provides the required capital for individuals who appreciate the value of the loan the most.

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people who want to work and just need a bit of money to get started
lenders.occupational_info: I analyse business performance and individual motivation and put in place systems that support both

lenders.name: Heidi & Patrick
lenders.occupation: CFO of an investment management company
lenders.loan_because: Microlending fits with our philosophy and lifestyle. Lending to someone who wants to lift themselves up could not be a better use of our charitable dollars. We feel more connected to the world and people who just need a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: Never ending personal improvement through reading, experience, education and travel. Use your time here wisely.

lenders.name: Gisela
lenders.loan_because: It feels good and does good.

lenders.name: Tara

lenders.name: harry
lenders.loan_because: l think is best l give to the needy
lenders.occupational_info: we am a certified loan lender.we offer secured and unsecured loans to individuals and companies at low interest rate.we offer long and short term loans.My firm has recorded a lot of breakthroughs in the provision of first class financial services to our clients especially in the area of Loan syndication and capital provision for individuals and companies. In general we offer mortgages,home loans,car loans,hotel loans,commercial loans, construction loans, startup- working capital loans,business loans and bad credit loans, e.t.c, We would love to fund projects at hand and offer personal loans as well to you,your firm/partners and clients. We offer the right solution to your financial needs. We stand apart from other lenders because we believe in customer service and we stay with you until you get the results you want. We are a group of energetic and experienced loan professionals with thorough knowledge of financial markets. We have many partners in real estate, banking and technology fields that can assist obtain financing. Almost all of our business are through referrals by satisfied and repeat customers. We have brought ailing industries back to life and we back good business ideas by providing funds for their upstart. We have a network of Investors that < DIV>are willing to provide funds of whatever amount discrectly to individuals and organizations to start business and operations. As the leading provider of Commercial, Business and personal loans to individuals and corporations nationwide, we offer the right kind of financing in less amount of time it will take with traditional lenders. We also recruit Agents to assist our companies in receiving payments. In our bid to be useful to you, please tell us which area that you wish us to be of service to you. We wire loans to approved Clients via 1-Western Union 2-Money Gram 3-Bank Certified Check 4-Bank to Bank transfer 5-Online Banking. Respond Asap. Email : First_investment_service@yahoo.com.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: I am enthralled with efficiency of microfinance and have been thoroughly impressed with the Kiva concept (not to mention the simple and well designed site!) .
lenders.occupational_info:
My career has been focused on the technology/internet industry.  Currently, I am switching gears and volunteering overseas for at least the next 6 months. 

This November I will be going to Nigeria to volunteer with an organization called IDEA Builders (www.ideabuilders.org).  

IDEA Builders mainly works with women in Rural Nigeria to help set up micro-enterprises.  I will be over there to help work on Partnerships and Fundraising for the organization, and I think that Kiva could play a large role in that.

Please drop me a line if you have any other fundraising idea's, comments or questions.  

My email is gregorygunn@gmail.com.

Thanks!

lenders.name: Gary
lenders.loan_because: I want to respect and assist the working poor for trying to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide financial guidance to my company's owners.

lenders.name: Becca
lenders.loan_because: It keeps me humble. Growing up, I had very little, and still I view myself on the very bottom rung of the financial ladder. And it's so easy to let myself get tied up in all that I do not have, and forget that there are so many people all around the world that don't have food or water, or shelter, or even the assurance that they will survive to see the next week. Kiva reminds me that although I do not have a lot, the little that I have to give means a lot to those who have nothing.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: In order for anything real to be done about world poverty, individuals need to get personally involved, instead of waiting for governments to do something.
